Account Id.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the budget.

Type.description: The type of budget entity, such as campaign or ad group budget.

Status.description: The current status of the budget, such as active or paused.

Id.description: The unique identifier of the budget entity.

Parent Id.description: The identifier of the parent entity to which the budget belongs, if applicable.

Client Id.description: The unique identifier of the client associated with the budget.

Modified Time.description: The date and time when the budget information was last modified.

Budget Id.description: The unique identifier of the budget.

Budget Name.description: The name assigned to the budget for easy identification.

Budget.description: The amount allocated for spending on advertising campaigns.

Budget Type.description: The type of budget allocation, such as daily or monthly.
